mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_LINK( id, category_id, title, color, image, href, weight, weight_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{category.id}, #{title}, #{color}, #{image}, #{href}, #{weight}, #{weightDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
